ingredients.item: 375g pack essential Waitrose Sliced Beef Shin
100g Capsicana Chilli & Lemon Peruvian Cook Sauce
400g can black beans, drained and rinsed

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large frying pan and fry the beef shin for 3-4 minutes to brown. Add the chilli and lemon sauce, tomatoes, beans, bay, thyme, celery, carrots and the chopped stalks from the coriander and bring to the boil.
Transfer to a slow cooker and set on low. Cover and leave to slow cook for 6 hours or until the meat is really tender. Chop the coriander leaves and stir into the casserole. Serve with cooked rice.
